mapper.select: SELECT pr.`prescriptionReferenceID`, pr.`appointmentID`, pr.`refferedDoctorID`, rd.doctorName, rd.doctorAddress, pr.`updatedBy`, pr.`updatedOn`, pr.`createdBy`, pr.`createdOn` FROM `prescription_reference` pr JOIN doctor_feed.referred_doctor rd ON pr.refferedDoctorID = rd.referredDoctorID WHERE pr.prescriptionReferenceID = #{prescriptionReferenceID}
